blogPost.excerpt: As a newsletter creator, finding paying sponsors is hard! Swapstack is a marketplace connecting brands & writers to run paid sponsorships. ✍️ As a writer: Work with brands your readers love. 💼 As a brand: Work with writers who speak to your audience.
blogPost.body: As a newsletter creator, finding paying sponsors is hard! Swapstack is a marketplace connecting brands & writers to run paid sponsorships. ✍️ As a writer: Work with brands your readers love. 💼 As a brand: Work with writers who speak to your audience.
blogPost.title: Swapstack - A marketplace connecting newsletters & brands
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 作为一个通讯创作者，寻找付费赞助是很难的！Swapstack是一个连接品牌和作家的市场，可以提供付费赞助。Swapstack是一个连接品牌和作者的市场，让他们进行付费赞助。✍️作为一名作家。与你的读者喜欢的品牌合作。💼 作为一个品牌。与能与你的读者对话的作家合作。
localize.tagline: 连接新闻通讯和品牌的市场

localize.description: 作爲一個通訊創作者，尋找付費贊助是很難的！Swapstack是一個連接品牌和作家的市場，可以提供付費贊助。Swapstack是一個連接品牌和作者的市場，讓他們進行付費贊助。✍️作爲一名作家。與你的讀者喜歡的品牌合作。💼 作爲一個品牌。與能與你的讀者對話的作家合作。
localize.tagline: 連接新聞通訊和品牌的市場

previous.excerpt: Afterword is a simple personal library that makes book tracking and sharing reads with friends easier. Afterword features an activity feed, a recommendations page, and the library page to track your own books and see your friend's profiles.
previous.title: Afterword - The simplest personal library for readers

localize.description: Afterword是一个简单的个人图书馆，它让书籍追踪和与朋友分享阅读变得更容易。Afterword的功能包括活动源、推荐页面和图书馆页面，可以追踪自己的书籍，查看朋友的资料。
localize.tagline: 读者最简单的个人图书馆

localize.description: Afterword是一個簡單的個人圖書館，它讓書籍追蹤和與朋友分享閱讀變得更容易。Afterword的功能包括活動源、推薦頁面和圖書館頁面，可以追蹤自己的書籍，查看朋友的資料。
localize.tagline: 讀者最簡單的個人圖書館

next.excerpt: Get inside the minds of top Product Leaders from Netflix, Amazon and Spotify with these templates covering the nine most common Product Management scenarios — presented by Product School, MURAL and Coda.
next.title: Product Management Templates - 9 essential templates created by product leaders

localize.description: 通过这些模板进入Netflix、亚马逊和Spotify的顶级产品负责人的思维，这些模板涵盖了九种最常见的产品管理场景--由Product School、MURAL和Coda提出。
localize.tagline: 产品负责人打造的9个必备模板

localize.description: 通過這些模板進入Netflix、亞馬遜和Spotify的頂級產品負責人的思維，這些模板涵蓋了九種最常見的產品管理場景--由Product School、MURAL和Coda提出。
localize.tagline: 產品負責人打造的9個必備模板
